description: Gets the manifest describing a service type. The response contains the service manifest XML as a string.

body.Manifest:
<ServiceManifest xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ManifestId="4dee858c-5b39-44f2-8d22-26b184493937" Name="VisualObjects.ActorServicePkg" Version="14.0.0" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2011/01/fabric">
  <ServiceTypes>
    <StatefulServiceType ServiceTypeName="VisualObjects.ActorServiceType" HasPersistedState="true">
      <Extensions>
        <Extension Name="__GeneratedServiceType__" GeneratedId="e9ba88d7-7199-42f5-94fc-f093573f46c5|Persisted">
          <GeneratedNames xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2015/03/fabact-no-schema">
            <DefaultService Name="VisualObjects.ActorService" />
            <ServiceEndpoint Name="VisualObjects.ActorServiceEndpoint" />
            <ReplicatorEndpoint Name="VisualObjects.ActorServiceReplicatorEndpoint" />
            <ReplicatorConfigSection Name="VisualObjects.ActorServiceReplicatorConfig" />
            <ReplicatorSecurityConfigSection Name="VisualObjects.ActorServiceReplicatorSecurityConfig" />
            <StoreConfigSection Name="VisualObjects.ActorServiceLocalStoreConfig" />
          </GeneratedNames>
        </Extension>
      </Extensions>
    </StatefulServiceType>
  </ServiceTypes>
  <CodePackage Name="Code" Version="11.0.0">
    <EntryPoint>
      <ExeHost>
        <Program>VisualObjects.ActorService.exe</Program>
      </ExeHost>
    </EntryPoint>
  </CodePackage>
  <ConfigPackage Name="Config" Version="3.0.0" />
  <Resources>
    <Endpoints>
      <Endpoint Name="VisualObjects.ActorServiceEndpoint" />
      <Endpoint Name="VisualObjects.ActorServiceReplicatorEndpoint" />
    </Endpoints>
  </Resources>
</ServiceManifest>
